Using the hash manager allows you to map a RESTful hash (e.g. http://www.sky.com/#!weather/edit) to a javascript function.

You can register a `wild card` hash (e.g. basket/*) to quickly assign a single function to a number of hashes.

If a wild card hash has been registered along side an `exact` hash (e.g. basket/show) then the `exact` match function would be executed.
